tool.name: Get.label
tool.description: label names from list, sabund, or rabund file
tool.command:
echo 'get.label( #if $otu.is_of_type("mothur.rabund"): rabund=$otu #elif $otu.is_of_type("mothur.sabund"): sabund=$otu #else list=$otu #end if )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile" &&
## parse relevant output from logfile to file cat "$logfile" | head -n-3 | sed '1,29d' > "$labels_list"

param.name: otu
param.label: Input file. May be shared, sabund or rabund file

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The get.label_ command generate principle components plot data.
.. _get.label: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Get.label
v.1.20.0: Updated to Mothur 1.33
